titles.title: Transportation for Heroes Act of 2015
To amend title 49, United States Code, with respect to urbanized area formula grants, and for other purposes.
Transportation for Heroes Act of 2015

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

bill.summary:
Transportation for Heroes Act of 2015
Revises urbanized area formula grant recipient requirements to require a recipient to certify that it will ensure a fare of no more than 50% of the peak hour fare will be charged to a U.S. veteran during non-peak hours for transportation using or involving a facility or equipment of a project financed by the grant.
